SEARCH
Package researcher

Class ResearcherDecorator

java.lang.Object
researcher.ResearcherDecorator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Researcher
public class ResearcherDecorator extends Object implements Researcher, Serializable
The ResearcherDecorator class is a decorator for the User class, providing additional functionalities related to managing research projects and papers. It implements the Researcher interface and is Serializable.
See Also:
